featuring a 6.2 - 7.1 mil paper liner, 3m paint protection film 8591 is flexible and die-cuttable to make it easier to apply even on complex automotive surfaces
this linered film has no clearcoat, ideal for protecting non-visible areas.

developed specifically for protecting automotive surfaces from scratches, galvanic corrosion, abrasion and wear, 3m paint protection film 8591 is an excellent alternative to molded protectors which can detract from finished vehicle appearance
flexible die-cuttable film makes application easier even to complex automotive surfaces
2 mil pressure-sensitive adhesive makes for fast, efficient application without curing
